The video clip was published on Facebook: 2019, and has been viewed over 1.6 million times and shared over 64,000 times.
The caption of the Facebook post transla: See what happens when the cops could not distribute the money equally among themselves after collecting traffic fines."
The same video was shared on multiple pl: including Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube, with similar claims of Indian police officers attacking each other after the hike in traffic fines.
The video has circulated online since 20: It actually shows police officers fighting over security arrangements at an event attended by the then-chief minister of Uttar Pradesh, Akhilesh Yadav.
